item.g:title: e world unbox happiness e World Fixed Wall Mount for 32-85 inch screen – SH 65F - Heavy-duty Fixed TV Wall Mount I Vesa 600x400mm I Weight up to 60kg (Black).
item.g:description: About this itemProduct Dimensions: ‎ 65 x 15 x 43 cm; 1. 6 kgBULLET POINTS UNIVERSAL TV COMPATIBILITY- Our TV wall mount is compatible with most of 32"-85" TVs with VESA from 75x75mm to 600x400mm. Max. Weight capacity up to 60 kg. The wall mount is compatible with all major TV brands. Please check the VESA pattern, weight, size of your TV before purchasing. Can be mounted to single wood stud wall and concrete/brick wall. STABLE AND RELIABLE CHOICE - This TV bracket is constructed with premium steel materials, more sturdy and flexible. It has been stress tested to hold 4 times its weight. We are so confident in the construction, strength and durability of this wall bracket. It will keep your new TV safe. SPACE SAVING - Save valuable space and add a nice, uncluttered look to your household with our TV bracket. EASY TO TURN - You can slide both TV mounts left and right to make your TV center easily and get the most comfortable viewing experienceSATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We believe in the quality of our TV mount and satisfaction of our customers is our top priority. If you are not happy with our mount for any reason, Please feel free to contact us to get a FULL REFUND.

item.g:title: Xiaomi Redmi Buds 4 White
item.g:description: Up to 35db hybrid active noise cancellation. 3 ANC level options and adaptive ANC modeAI noise reduction. Dual transparency mode10mm dynamic driver unit, 0. 006mm ultra-thin diaphragmUp to 30 hours long battery life with caseOverviewHi-Res Audio Wireless - Supports advanced LDAC audio codec: Redmi Buds 5 Pro is certified by Hi-Res Audio Wireless and supports LDAC audio codec with a sampling rate of up to 24bit/96kHz*, enabling Ultra HD audio with minimal distortion. Custom coaxial dual driver design - High-resolution, Hi-Fi sound quality: Redmi Buds 5 Pro features a coaxial dual driver design, which consists of an 11mm bass driver with titanium diaphram and a 10mm piezoelectric ceramic tweeter. This design delivers precise sound reproduction across all frequencies, ensuring a balanced performance with smooth highs, rich mids, and solid lows, allowing you to experience high-quality Hi-Fi sound at any time. Built-in immersive sound: Providing enhanced audio immersion across a range of content, Redmi Buds 5 Pro is ideal for watching movies on TV, computers, or tablets, delivering a captivating audio experience every time*. Vegan leather texture design - Understated and refined: For the first time, vegan leather was incorporated into the lower part of the black version of the case to provide a unique texture with a delicate feel and a more refined appearance. Marble texture design: The ear stem design incorporates natural elements using a multi-layer coating process to create a distinctive marble texture effect. Subtle yet distinctive, it suggests a personality both low-key and full of charm. Up to 52dB active noise cancellation: With industry-leading 52dB active noise cancellation technology, the upmost noise reduction capability has tripled compared to Redmi Buds 4 Pro, allowing you to enjoy your music in peace. SpecificationsColour Name WhiteConnection Type USB Type CAudio Jack No Audio JackAudio Headphone Type In-EarModel Number 38561 / M2137E1Model Name 38561

item.g:title: belkin MagSafe Charger, Magnetic Wireless Phone Charging Pad (For iPhone 14, 13 and 12 Series and Other MagSafe Enabled Devices, Power Adaptor Not Included) white
item.g:description: MAGSAFE COMPATIBLE: Utilizing Apple's MagSafe Technology, this Belkin wireless charger delivers efficient and secure charging wireless charging. PERFECT MAGNETIC ATTACHMENT: Aligns perfectly with the MagSafe feature of your iPhone 12 to charge, and keeps your phone from being bumped and disconnecting from power while allowing you to easily snap it in place with one hand. TRAVEL FRIENDLY: A slim, portable design allows you to easily slip the pad into purses or laptop cases and take it with you anywhere. SAFE AND SECURE: An LED light on the stand indicates if there’s any charging interruption from a foreign object that could potentially harm your phone. OverviewSeamless magnetic attachment creates new iPhone 12 experiences. Designed so that you can keep using your phone while it charges, and place or take it anywhere with an extra-long cable. item.g:title: belkin Boostcharge Usb-C To Usb-A Charger Cable, Type C Cable, Usb C Cable For Iphone 15, Samsung Galaxy S24, S24+, S24 Ultra, Pixel, Ipad Pro, Nintendo Switch And More - 1M White
item.g:description: Universal compatibility: Our boostcharge usb-c to usb-a charger cable is compatible with a wide range of devices, including iphone 15, samsung galaxy s24 series, s24, s24+, s24 ultra, pixel, ipad pro, nintendo switch, and moreVersatile type-c cable: Designed for convenience and efficiency, this usb c cable supports fast charging and data transfer, ensuring seamless connectivity across various gadgetsDurable construction: Crafted with high-quality materials, our type c cable is built to last, providing reliable performance and longevity even with daily useOptimal length: With a 1m length, this usb-c to usb-a cable strikes the perfect balance between flexibility and convenience, suitable for use at home, in the office, or on the goSleek white design: Finished in a stylish white color, our charger cable adds a touch of elegance to your charging setup while maintaining a modern aestheticOverviewIntroducing our BoostCharge USB-C to USB-A Charger Cable, the ultimate solution for your charging needs. With universal compatibility, this cable supports a wide array of devices, including the latest iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S24 series (S24, S24+, S24 Ultra), Pixel, iPad Pro, Nintendo Switch, and more, ensuring seamless connectivity across your entire tech ecosystem. Designed for versatility, our Type-C cable facilitates fast charging and efficient data transfer, making it indispensable for your everyday tasks. Crafted with durability in mind, its high-quality construction ensures reliable performance and longevity, even with frequent use. The optimal 1m length provides flexibility for use at home, in the office, or while on the move, while its sleek white design adds a touch of sophistication to your charging setup. Say goodbye to tangled cords and hello to effortless charging with our BoostCharge USB-C to USB-A Charger Cable. SpecificationsColour Name WhiteCable Length 2 to 3. 9 FeetProduct Length 1 mModel Number CAB001bt1MWHModel Name CAB001bt1MWH

item.g:title: HUAWEI WiFi AX2 Dual-Band Home Router White
item.g:description: Huawei's mission is to bring digital to every person, home and organization for a fully connected, intelligent world. To this end, we will drive ubiquitous connectivity and promote equal access to networks to lay the foundation for the intelligent world; provide diversified computing power to deliver ubiquitous cloud and intelligence; build powerful digital platforms to help all industries and organizations become more agile, efficient, and dynamic; redefine user experience with AI, offering consumers a more personalized and intelligent experience across all scenarios, including home, travel, office, entertainment, and fitness and health. Trending offers a new visual experience and greatly improved productivity via a more vivid home screen layout. Customize the Service Widgets13 to enjoy shortcuts to frequently used apps and services. Discover more easy-to-view features to make you workflow smoother, feel the smooth, delicate touch of its fine texture, whether it's the vegan leather version in lively Olive Green, or the classic version in refined Matte Grey. Different styles and same elegance n 2021, Huawei invested even more in research and innovation, as part of our greater efforts to sustain development in the future. We are sparing no efforts as we explore the endless frontiers of science and technology. We are also devoting efforts to identifying the needs of different industries and overcoming global challenges. Guided by our vision of a fully connected, intelligent world, we will work openly with the global scientific community to explore new theories, architectures, and technologies, which will support the ongoing development of the industry. Huawei works with customers to balance opportunities and risks, quickly responding to their needs and achieving sustainable growth. Also undertakes to provide customers quality-assured products, services, and solutions and consistently enable customers to experience our commitment in creating value for each of them. item.g:title: Xiaomi Buds 3T Pro | 3+1 Active Noise Cancelling Modes | Dual-Device Connectivity | Supports Wireless Charging | 24h Long Battery Life With Charging Case White
item.g:description: Up to 40dB adaptive ANC Equipped with a powerful independent ANC processor, bringing up to 40dB hybrid noise cancellation capability. 3-mic noise cancellation for calls: clear calls even in noisy places. 3+1 ANC modes Light mode for Relaxing in a park, Balanced Mode for Walking in an office building, Deep mode for Noisy subway commute. And in adaptive mode, intelligently detect ambient noise level and choose the most suitable noise cancellation level for you. Dual Transparency modes in transparency mode, you can stay alert of your surroundings without taking out the earbuds. It also supports voice enhancement to keep voice frequencies clear, making it easier to chat with friends in noisy environments. Luxury dynamic driver 10mm dual-magnet dynamic driver coated with DLC diaphragm. Studio level sound quality designed with luxury unit. Surround sound Surround sound can position sound all around you and provide a true-to life listening experience Dual-device connectivity It can be connected with two devices simultaneously. The devices include smartphones, tablets, PCs, and other smart devices. Supports LHDC 4. 0 codec LHDC 4. 0 enables users to experience a better sound quality with more details. LHDC 4. 0 supports premium sound quality streaming. Track head movement Brings you a relatively fixed sound space. Every detail stays where it should be when you move your head. IP55 Rated Dust and Water Resistance It is rigorously designed and certified IP55 dust and water resistant. Worry-free listening while sweating at the gym. Comfortable & secure wearing Each earbud of Xiaomi Buds 3T Pro only weighs approx. 4. 9g. Focus ear buds design around tragus, antitragus and cavum conchae for comfortable and secure fit. Super large vent design creates air flow and balances the pressure around your ear. Supports Wireless Charging It is compatible with Qi-certified chargers. SpecificationsBattery Size 480 mAhColour Name WhiteConnection Type WirelessWhat's In The Box HeadphoneAudio Headphone Type In-EarModel Number BHR5177GLModel Name Xiaomi Buds 3T Pro

item.g:title: Xiaomi Mi Wireless Outdoor Security Camera 1080p Kit
item.g:description: IP65 Dustproof And Waterproof No fear of high and low temperatures. Adapt to different temperatures, stable and reliable operation. It can operate normally in the environment of -20 to 50C*, endure the heat and cold, and guard outdoor safety in all seasons. WDR Technology + Smart Night Vision Backlight and dark light, all can be seen clearly. WDR wide dynamic technology, F2. 1 large aperture, backlight, dark light can also shoot fine picture details. 7m long-distance night vision, clearly showing the situation outside the house at night. 130°Wide-Angle 130° wide viewing angle help to capture more content. With 1080P resolution, the camera will restore the real scenes. A Variety Of Storage Methods Indoor video storage to prevent the leakage of shooting information. Optional local TF card, U disk, cloud storage are three ways to meet the needs of screen storage. With a new generation of H. 265 video encoding technology, it saves video storage space. Under the same network conditions, the connection is more stable and the screen viewing is smoother. Base Anti-Theft Design Illegal touch timely warning. The body adopts an anti-theft screw structure and a built-in gyroscope, When the fuselage is detected to be abnormal, the warning information will be sent to the mobile phone in time *safety information will be known immediately. PIR Humanoid Detection Changes outside the house, timely notification. Perceive temperature changes and object movements within 7m, start recording immediately, and push alarms. Intelligent detection of human contours, and through cloud AI face recognition technology, can judge acquaintances and strangers and give effective alarms. item.g:title: Xiaomi Sound Outdoor Portable Speaker 30W Black
item.g:description: POWERFUL SPEAKER: With a power output of 30W, this Xiaomi Sound Outdoor speaker delivers high-quality sound and impressive volumeHEAVY DUTY DESIGN: Built for outdoor use, features a water and dust resistant housing, ideal for camping, pools, or outdoor parties. Long battery life: Enjoy up to 12 hours of continuous playback on a single charge thanks to its 2600mAh battery. Wireless connectivity: Bluetooth 5. 4 compatible0 for stable connection and hassle-free audio streaming from your device. OverviewThe Xiaomi Sound Outdoor 30W is a powerful portable speaker designed to bring sound to your outdoor adventures. With 30W output power and sturdy construction, this Bluetooth speaker will let you enjoy your favorite music with high-quality sound anywhere. Its long battery life gives you up to 12 hours of continuous playback, while its IP67 rating makes it water and dust resistant, ideal for camping, going to the beach, or just relaxing in the backyard. In addition, its compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry. With a Bluetooth range of up to 25 meters, you can control your music wirelessly from your smart device. The Xiaomi Sound Outdoor 30W is the perfect companion for your outdoor adventures, offering you powerful and long-lasting sound in a portable, rugged package.
